stepAnswer: Select "Make a copy" from the File menu.
stepTitle: You are trying to make a copy of your Google Sheets spreadsheet while you are working in the spreadsheet. What action should you take?
choices: Select "Save as" from the File menu.
Rename your spreadsheet to add the words "Copy of" to the beginning of the title.
Click the Save button and select "Save a copy" from the pop up.
Select "Make a copy" from the File menu.
